snippet: The trial in absentia of four former Israeli military commanders charged in the 2010 killings of nine people aboard a Gaza-bound aid ship opened Tuesday in Istanbul.
abstract: Trial in absentia of four former Israeli military commanders charged in 2010 killings of nine people aboard Gaza-bound aid ship opens in Istanbul.
lead_paragraph: The trial in absentia of four former Israeli military commanders charged in the 2010 killings of nine people aboard a Gaza-bound aid ship opened Tuesday in Istanbul.

headline.main: Turkey: Trial of Israelis Begins Over Gaza Flotilla Raid
